DOC.brief_summary: To provide access palbociclib post-menopausal woman HR-positive , HER2-negative advance breast cancer deem appropriate letrozole therapy ( Canada : first-line patient ) .
DOC.brief_title: Expanded Access Study Of Palbociclib ( PD-0332991 ) In Combination With Letrozole As Treatment Of Post-Menopausal Women With HR-Positive , Her2-Negative Advanced Breast Cancer For Whom Letrozole Therapy Is Deemed Appropriate
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal woman 18 year age proven diagnosis advance adenocarcinoma breast ( locoregionally recurrent metastatic disease ) ERpositive and/or PRpositive tumor base local laboratory result HER2negative tumor base local laboratory result Patients must appropriate candidate letrozole therapy ( Canada : firstline patient ) Patients previously participate palbociclib trial receive prior treatment CDK inhibitor
